meanings.definition: Relating to the study of ancient life forms.
meanings.sent1: The paleobiological research uncovered fossilized remains of dinosaurs.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use paleobiological methods to learn about creatures that lived long ago.
meanings.sent3: The paleobiological expedition found a fossil that looked like a prehistoric puzzle piece.
meanings.sent4: Her interest in paleobiological mysteries led her to explore ancient ecosystems.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit brought the paleobiological past to life with detailed reconstructions.

meanings.definition: Involving the biological aspects of prehistoric organisms.
meanings.sent1: The paleobiological characteristics of the ancient species fascinated researchers.
meanings.sent2: Studying paleobiological features helps us understand how life evolved over time.
meanings.sent3: The paleobiological analysis of the fossil revealed surprising details about its diet.
meanings.sent4: His paleobiological expertise allowed him to identify the ancient creature from just a bone fragment.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showcased the paleobiological wonders of the prehistoric world.
